title.rendered: Graphic Designing Internship at IIM Udaipur [2-4 Months, Stipend of Rs. 15-20k]: Apply by March 24

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for Graphic Designing Internship at IIM Udaipur for the year 2025. The last date of application is March 24.

About IIM Udaipur

IIM Udaipur, a second-generation IIM, one of the fastest-growing management schools in the country. It was set up by the Indian Government in 2011. Taking the legacy of older IIMs forward, IIMU aspires to set new benchmarks in the field of management education by combining excellence in both teaching and research. At IIM Udaipur, we are committed to becoming a globally recognized management school by 2030 and we are inevitably on our way.

With an accomplished faculty, a flourishing research ecosystem and success in attracting the best minds of the country, IIMU is able to champion our core values of excellence and integrity. At IIMU, we challenge our students to expand their knowledge and their intellectual horizons so they emerge transformed and prepared to have an impact on the world of business and society at large.

About the Internship

The IIMU Executive Education office is seeking enthusiastic individuals to join an innovative initiative bridging academic knowledge with practical implementation in digital business and entrepreneurship. This internship offers a dynamic, collaborative environment where you’ll specialize in your chosen field while supporting program-related tasks, gaining holistic exposure to various aspects of program management and operations.

We are offering two distinct roles. Applicants should select and apply for only one role based on their skills and interests.

About the Role

Shape the program’s visual identity through impactful projects that inspire and engage.

Qualification

Design enthusiasts proficient in Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar tools. Knowledge of motion graphics or video editing is a bonus.

  • Proficiency in role-specific tools and skills.
  • Excellent communication, teamwork, and time management abilities.
  • Proactive and flexible approach to responsibilities.

Responsibilities

  • Design brochures, posters, social media graphics, and corporate presentation
  • Develop templates for consistent branding.
  • Collaborate on innovative design ideas.
  • Experiment with fresh design styles.
  • Provide visuals for presentations and digital displays.
  • Ensure designs align with the program’s vision.
  • Create compelling content for blogs, social media, and newsletters.
  • Collaborate with graphic design teams to develop promotional materials.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply online via this page.

Deadline

Application Closing Date: 24th March 2025.

Duration

2-4 Months.

Stipend

₹15,000–₹20,000/month.

Click here for the official notification of Graphic Designing Internship at IIM Udaipur.
